title: Introducing: Axel Flóvent
body:
19-year-old **Axel Flóvent** has just released his deput EP, Forest Fires, which demands a larger audience than that of the tiny finishing village in Northern Iceland in which he grew up in.

A modern take on folk singing which is not dissimilar in sound to Fleet Foxes, Alex creates majestic tracks which work in harmony with his thoughtful piano melodies.

A modern take on folk singing which is not dissimilar in sound to Fleet Foxes, Alex creates majestic tracks which work in harmony with his thoughtful piano melodies.
